alert.note: Alert for Hall; White (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 09 at 3:24PM EST until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City GA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Georgia... Chattahoochee River near Cornelia affecting Hall and White Counties. For the Chattahoochee River Basin...including Helen, Dahlonega, Cornelia, Suwanee, Buford, Buford, Suwanee, Chattahoochee River upstream McGinnis Ferry Rd, Norcross, Chattahoochee River above Roswell, Roswell, Smyrna, Chattahoochee River below Morgan Falls Dam, Powers Ferry & I285 Atlanta, Atlanta, Atlanta, Atlanta, Atlanta, Fairburn, Fairplay, Whitesburg, Whitesburg, Whitesburg, Franklin, Hammett Rd below Hogansville, Corinth, Franklin, West Point, Union, Columbus, Omaha...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Chattahoochee River near Cornelia. * WHEN...From this afternoon until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:45 PM EST Tuesday the stage was 14.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 2:45 PM EST Tuesday was 14.2 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 14.3 feet on 02/06/2020. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 330 AM EST.
